physicalDescription.extent: The file’s contents are arranged in approximate chronological order, from the earliest item at the front to the latest at the end. The file notes at the end of the file (ff 10-11) mirror the chronological arrangement.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Correspondence between the Bahrain Petroleum Company (BAPCO) Oriental Club and the Political Agency in Bahrain, dated 1938, concerning permission to hold a ‘mimic cinema’ in the Company club house (ff 2-4).Correspondence and papers relating to two other sports and social clubs are also included in the file:an income and expenditure sheet for the year ending December 1941 for the Bahrain Gymkhana Club (f 5);a BAPCO proposal to form an archery club, to which the Political Agency and Bahrain Government have no objection (ff 6-9).
